Text:
Classification: Scripted
Genre: Drama | Family | Mystery | Thriller
Status: New Series
Network: Netflix ( USA)
Airs: Fridays
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: February 01, 2013
Episode Order: 13

“House of Cards,” explores the ruthless underside of British politics at the end of the Thatcher era. Reset against the backdrop of modern-day U.S. electoral politics, this new one-hour drama follows Spacey as an ambitious politician with his eye on the top job. 
(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-27822)

Kevin Spacey + David Fincher = Must download

There's a framerate problem, picture is really jerky. And it's not my player, I tried with all of them. It's not just this source, I tried another one and it's jerky as well. And I've downloaded an episode #2, jerky again.
really strange that no one else seems to be complaining about tha problem...

> .Leto. at 2013-02-03 12:47 CET:
That's because of the method those rips are made: they are not downloaded, but captured from video player (it's easier).

There are tons of exact reasons of why they are jerky, but for me it looks like Flash's problem. Ever noticed how Flash-based video players are starting lagging after downloading (pre-caching) the whole video and eat up your CPU, causing "lags", or even full freezes?
@ nutbask: Thanks for the explanation, I thought there was something wrong with my computer.

Low Quality Video.
Lots of artifacts, laggy...
